name: Rock Star Manager (itch)
description:
Manage your own Music Studio!

Congratulations! You're about to buy your own music studio! 

To strive in the music industry you must:

  • Scout and Hire Bands
  • Train your musicians
  • Schedule gigs and albums
  • Deal with the musicians personal problems
  • Manage your money and reputation

Good luck in your journey. I'll surely root for your success!

Responda um pequeno questionário e ajude a melhorar o jogo!
